repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

commit.message: Initial (incomplete) attempt at supporting the Py3.7 exception state stack.
Work around a crash for now.
Keep a note of what needs to be done.
Always break the frame back-pointer chain when exiting from a generator, so that it can be reconnected on the next entry.
Disable a failing test case that is less important than the rest of the Py3.7 exception stack implementation.
Disable some CPython exception unit tests in older Python versions.
